name: Endless Apocalypse (itch)
description:
Endless Apocalypse

Endless Apocalypse is a single-player third person Zombie apocalypse shooter in a beautiful land of Lanceton, a fictional countryside somewhere on the planet earth. 

Our main protagonist is the Curator, a self conscious sentient robot tasked with the job of gathering data about all the sentient beings of the galaxy. But when the Curator reached earth, it was already on the verge of apocalypse. Wars, Bio-weapons and AI uprising has caused the fall of human civilization long ago. 

With the absence of huge human population, the nature took its chance to regain the earth. Now all that remains are the small human settlements living under the tyranny of a new Anti-Technology cult, with a stupendous goal of pushing mankind to the primitive era for the fear of technology. On the other hand, ZOMBIES!!!

Endless Apocalypse is actively in development. Currently it contains, Endless Arena Game mode. A single player story expansion is planned, but I am just a single dev. So no promises!
